Welcome to My_project’s documentation!¶

My_project main¶

async main.read_root()¶

Root endpoint that returns a welcome message. Rate limited to 10 requests per minute.

Returns:

A welcome message.

Return type:

dict

main.startup(app: FastAPI)¶

Manages the startup and shutdown of the Redis client and initializes the FastAPILimiter.

Parameters:

app (FastAPI) – The FastAPI application instance.

My_project repository Contact¶

async My_project.repository.contact.create_contact(body: ContactCreate, user: User, db: AsyncSession) → Contact¶

Creates a new contact for a given user.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactCreate) – The details of the contact to create.

  • user (User) – The user for whom the contact is being created.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

The newly created contact.

Return type:

Contact

async My_project.repository.contact.get_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: AsyncSession) → Contact | None¶

Retrieves a specific contact by ID for a given user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve the contact for.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

The contact if found, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[Contact]

async My_project.repository.contact.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: AsyncSession) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async My_project.repository.contact.remove_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: AsyncSession) → Contact | None¶

Deletes a specific contact for a given user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to delete.

  • user (User) – The user who owns the contact.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

The deleted contact if found, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[Contact]

async My_project.repository.contact.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdate, user: User, db: AsyncSession) → Contact | None¶

Updates an existing contact for a given user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to update.

  • body (ContactUpdate) – The new details of the contact.

  • user (User) – The user who owns the contact.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

The updated contact if found, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[Contact]
